column4: Can't imagine this to be a common question: I installed a second HD in my laptop. As this means I can no longer have a CD, i set up VMWare to use the raw disk, booted from the iso, installed, booted onto the new disk (natively, not VMware). Everything works great, EXCEPT that my IDE disks for some reason shows up as /dev/sda and /dev/sdb! During the install, i presume VMware virtualized the disk as SCSI, so I was much surprised to find it worked wit
